channel.title: Does a server HAVE to have a VPS for it to run
channel.description: Does your private server have to have a VPS so that other players connect, can't you just host it off your computer?

item.title: Does a server HAVE to have a VPS for it to run
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“gnomez, post:2, topic:377762”]i think this goes in client help but if your worried about it costing just use no-ip its free[/quote][quote=“why so serious, post:3, topic:377762”]No, If you turn on source you can host.
Just don’t turn off[/quote]

No, You don’t need a vps too host.

If you are using no-ip, then your players can connect on your no-ip; The only thing that no-ip is used for is for hiding your ip-address. Otherwise if you didn’t have no-ip people would have to connect on your ip address.

Can you connect too your server? YOU Are suppossed to connect on localhost (127.0.0.1) And your PLAYERS are supposed to connect on your no-ip/ip address.

If you can connect to your server, and your players can’t try turning off your firewall.

Read full topic
item.source: Does a server HAVE to have a VPS for it to run

Just don’t turn off
